TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class SqlConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 提供簡單的方法，以建立和管理 類別使用之連接字串的內容。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接字串產生器 (Builder) 可讓開發人員使用類別的屬性和方法，以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重建現有的連接字串。The connection string builder lets developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 連接字串產生器提供強型別 (Strongly Typed) 屬性，這些屬性對應到 SQL Server 允許的已知索引鍵/值組。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by SQL Server. 必須建立連接字串做為應用程式一部分的開發人員可以使用 類別來建置及修改連接字串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 此類別也可讓您輕鬆管理儲存在應用程式組態檔內的連接字串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 會執行有效索引鍵/值組的檢查。The performs checks for valid key/value pairs. 因此，您無法使用這個類別來建立無效的連接字串，嘗試加入無效的索引鍵/值組將會擲回例外狀況。Therefore, you cannot use this class to create invalid connection strings; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception. 此類別會維護固定的同義資料表 (Synonym) 集合，且可從同義資料表轉譯為相對應的已知索引鍵名稱。The class maintains a fixed collection of synonyms and can translate from a synonym to the corresponding well-known key name. 例如，當您使用**項目**屬性擷取值，您可以指定字串，包含您所需要的索引鍵的任何同義。For example, when you use the **Item** property to retrieve a value, you can specify a string that contains any synonym for the key you need. 例如，您可以指定"Network Address"、"addr"或其他任何可接受同義字，此連接字串中的索引鍵時使用任何成員需要字串，包含索引鍵的名稱，例如**項目**屬性或方法。For example, you can specify "Network Address", "addr", or any other acceptable synonym for this key within a connection string when you use any member that requires a string that contains the key name, such as the **Item** property or the method. 如需可接受的完整同義資料表清單，請參閱 屬性。See the property for a full list of acceptable synonyms. **項目**屬性控制代碼嘗試插入惡意的項目。The **Item** property handles tries to insert malicious entries. 例如，使用預設 Item 屬性 (C# 中則為索引子) 的下列程式碼會正確逸出巢狀索引鍵/值組：For example, the following code, using the default Item property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: ```vb Dim builder As New System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` ```csharp System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` 結果是以安全方式處理無效值的下列連接字串：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Source=(local);Initial Catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; Integrated Security=True ``` ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建置 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。The following console application builds connection strings for a SQL Server database. 此程式碼會使用 類別建立連接字串，然後將 執行個體的 屬性傳遞給連接類別的建構函式。The code uses a class to create the connection string, and then passes the property of the instance to the constructor of the connection class. 此範例也會剖析現有的連接字串，並示範操作連接字串內容的各種方式。The example also parses an existing connection string and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 所提供的連接字串會提供執行個體內部連接資訊的資料。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供索引鍵/值組的固定內部集合。The class provides a fixed internal collection of key/value pairs. 即使您只在建構函式中提供可能連接字串值的少量子集，此物件一定會針對每一個索引鍵/值組提供預設值。Even if you supply only a small subset of the possible connection string values in the constructor, the object always provides default values for each key/value pair. 當`ConnectionString`已擷取之物件的屬性，則字串會包含只在其中的值不是預設值的項目機碼值組。When the `ConnectionString` property of the object is retrieved, the string contains only key/value pairs in which the value is not the default value for the item. ## Examples 下列範例會在 物件的建構函式中提供簡單的 SQL Server 連接字串，然後逐一查看此物件內的所有索引鍵/值組。The following example supplies a simple SQL Server connection string in the object's constructor, and then iterates through all the key/value pairs within the object. 請注意，此集合會提供每一個項目的預設值。Note that the collection provides default values for each item. 也請注意， 類別會轉換已知索引鍵的同義資料表，使其與已知的名稱一致。Also note that the class converts synonyms for the well-known keys so that they are consistent with the well-known names. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的 "Application Name" 和 "app" 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Application Name" and "app" keys within the connection string. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的 ，並在物件的建構函式中指派連接字串。The following example creates a new and assigns a connection string in the object's constructor. 此程式碼會顯示已剖析及重建的連接字串版本，然後修改此物件的 屬性。The code displays the parsed and recreated version of the connection string, and then modifies the property of the object. 最後，此程式碼會顯示新的連接字串，包括新的索引鍵/值組。Finally, the code displays the new connection string, including the new key/value pair. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationName/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationName/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會在主控台視窗中顯示以下文字：The sample displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original: Data Source=(local);Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Integrated Security=True ApplicationName=".Net SqlClient Data Provider" Modified: Data Source=(local);Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Integrated Security=True;Application Name="My Application" ```

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指出使用這個連接字串建立的連接是否允許非同步處理 (Asynchronous Processing)。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether asynchronous processing is allowed by the connection created by using this connection string.

value.span: 屬性的值，如果未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if no value has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的 "Asynchronous Processing" 和 "async" 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Asynchronous Processing" and "async" keys within the connection string. 為了要利用 物件所提供的非同步處理，關聯之 物件的連接字串內必須包含這個索引鍵/值組。In order to take advantage of the asynchronous processing provided by the object, this key/value pair must be included within the connection string of the associated object. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取連接字串，並確認設定的連接字串允許非同步處理 The following example retrieves a connection string and verifies that the connection string is configured to allow for asynchronous processing. (在此情況下，此字串會來自應用程式內的程序，但是在實際執行應用程式中，連接字串可能來自組態檔或是某個其他來源)。然後，此範例會執行非同步作業，在背景執行緒上更新範例資料庫內的值。(In this case, the string comes from a procedure within the application, but in a production application, the connection string might come from a configuration file, or some other source.) Then, the example performs an asynchronous operation, updating values within a sample database on a background thread. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的 "Connect Timeout"、"connection timeout" 和 "timeout" 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Connect Timeout", "connection timeout", and "timeout" keys within the connection string. 開啟連線到 Azure SQL Database 時, 設定連接逾時為 30 秒。When opening a connection to a Azure SQL Database, set the connection timeout to 30 seconds. ## Examples 下列範例會先顯示未指定 "Connect Timeout" 值的連接字串內容、設定 屬性，然後顯示新的連接字串。The following example first displays the contents of a connection string that does not specify the "Connect Timeout" value, sets the property, and then displays the new connection string. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::SqlClient::PoolBlockingPeriod PoolBlockingPeriod { System::Data::SqlClient::PoolBlockingPeriod get(); void set(System::Data::SqlClient::PoolBlockingPeriod value); };
member this.PoolBlockingPeriod : System.Data.SqlClient.PoolBlockingPeriod with get, set

summary.span: 連接集區封鎖期間的行為。

span.span: The blocking period behavior for a connection pool.

value.span: 可用的封鎖期間設定。

span.span: The available blocking period settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當啟用連線共用和發生逾時錯誤或其他登入錯誤、 將會擲回例外狀況和後續連接嘗試的接下來五秒，而 「 封鎖期間 」，將會失敗。When connection pooling is enabled and a timeout error or other login error occurs, an exception will be thrown and subsequent connection attempts will fail for the next five seconds, the "blocking period". 如果應用程式嘗試在封鎖期間內連接，將再次擲回第一個例外狀況。If the application attempts to connect within the blocking period, the first exception will be thrown again. 封鎖期間結束後，後續的失敗會導致新的封鎖期間為兩倍，只要在先前的封鎖期間，最多一分鐘的時間。Subsequent failures after a blocking period ends will result in a new blocking period that is twice as long as the previous blocking period, up to a maximum of one minute. 嘗試連線到 Azure SQL database 可能會因暫時性錯誤通常會在幾秒內復原。Attempting to connect to Azure SQL databases can fail with transient errors which are typically recovered within a few seconds. 不過，使用連接集區封鎖期間的行為，您可能無法廣泛的期間連線到您的資料庫，即使資料庫可供使用。However, with the connection pool blocking period behavior, you may not be able to reach your database for extensive periods even though the database is available. 這是特別針對需要快速呈現的應用程式有問題。This is especially problematic for apps that need to render fast. **PoolBlockingPeriod**可讓您選取最適合您的應用程式的封鎖期間。The **PoolBlockingPeriod** enables you to select the blocking period best suited for your app. 請參閱列舉可用的設定。See the enumeration for available settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為**移除**方法會傳回值，指出它的成功，它不需要尋找索引鍵，然後再嘗試移除索引鍵/值組，從執行個體。Because the **Remove** method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. 因為 會維護固定大小的索引鍵/值組集合，所以呼叫 方法只會將索引鍵/值組的值重設回預設值。Because the maintains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, calling the method simply resets the value of the key/value pair back to its default value. 因為 支援的索引鍵集合是固定的，所以集合中的每一個項目都有已知的預設值。Because the collection of keys supported by the is fixed, every item within the collection has a known default value. 下表列出索引鍵，以及當初次初始化 或者在呼叫 方法之後每一個索引鍵的值。The following table lists the keys, and the value for each when the is first initialized, or after the method has been called. |KeyKey|預設值Default value| |---------|-------------------| |Application NameApplication Name|".Net SqlClient Data Provider"".Net SqlClient Data Provider"| |Asynchronous ProcessingAsynchronous Processing|FalseFalse| |AttachDBFilenameAttachDBFilename|空字串Empty string| |Connection TimeoutConnection Timeout|1515| |Context ConnectionContext Connection|FalseFalse| |Current LanguageCurrent Language|空字串Empty string| |資料來源Data Source|空字串Empty string| |EncryptEncrypt|FalseFalse| |EnlistEnlist|TrueTrue| |Failover PartnerFailover Partner|空字串Empty string| |Initial CatalogInitial Catalog|空字串Empty string| |Integrated SecurityIntegrated Security|FalseFalse| |Load Balance TimeoutLoad Balance Timeout|00| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size|100100| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size|00| |MultipleActiveResultSetsMultipleActiveResultSets|FalseFalse| |Network LibraryNetwork Library|空字串Empty string| |Packet SizePacket Size|80008000| |密碼Password|空字串Empty string| |Persist Security InfoPersist Security Info|FalseFalse| |PoolingPooling|TrueTrue| |ReplicationReplication|FalseFalse| |Transaction BindingTransaction Binding|Implicit UnbindImplicit Unbind| |User IDUser ID|空字串Empty string| |User InstanceUser Instance|FalseFalse| |Workstation IDWorkstation ID|空字串Empty string| ## Examples 下列範例會轉換現有的連接字串，將其從使用 Windows 驗證轉換成使用整合式安全性。The following example converts an existing connection string from using Windows Authentication to using integrated security. 此範例運作的方式是從連接字串中移除使用者名稱和密碼，然後設定 物件的 屬性。The example works by removing the user name and password from the connection string, and then setting the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會在主控台視窗中顯示以下文字：The example displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original: Data Source=(local);Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;User ID=ab;Password= a1Pass@@11 Modified: Data Source=(local);Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Integrated Security=True Database = AdventureWorks ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的 Transaction Binding 關鍵字會控制 如何繫結程序至已登記的 。The Transaction Binding keywords in a control how a binds to an enlisted . 下表顯示 屬性的可能值：The following table shows the possible values for the property: |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Implicit UnbindImplicit Unbind|預設值。The default. 結束時，使得連接與異動中斷連結。Causes the connection to detach from the transaction when it ends. 在中斷連結之後，連接上的其他要求會以自動認可模式執行。After detaching, additional requests on the connection are performed in autocommit mode. 當異動為使用中狀態時，執行要求時不會檢查 屬性。The property is not checked when executing requests while the transaction is active. 在此交易結束之後，其他要求會以自動認可模式執行。After the transaction has ended, additional requests are performed in autocommit mode.| |Explicit UnbindExplicit Unbind|原因連接持續連結至交易，直到連接關閉或直到以呼叫`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 的值。Causes the connection to remain attached to the transaction until the connection is closed or until is called with a `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) value. 如果 不是登記的異動或者登記的異動不是使用中狀態，則會擲回 。An is thrown if is not the enlisted transaction or if the enlisted transaction is not active. 這個行為會強制實行 支援所需的嚴格範圍規則。This behavior enforces the strict scoping rules required for support.|

summary.span: 當此索引鍵的值設定為 時，應用程式必須擷取特定 DNS 項目的所有 IP 位址，並嘗試連線至清單上的第一個項目。

span.span: When the value of this key is set to , the application is required to retrieve all IP addresses for a particular DNS entry and attempt to connect with the first one in the list.

summary.span: 如果無法在 0.5 秒內建立連線，應用程式將會嘗試同時連線至所有其他項目。

span.span: If the connection is not established within 0.5 seconds, the application will try to connect to all others in parallel.

summary.span: 在連線被接聽之後，應用程式便會與回應者的 IP 位址建立連線。

span.span: When the first answers, the application will establish the connection with the respondent IP address.

value.span: 布林值。

span.span: A boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`MultiSubnetFailover`金鑰設為`true`，`TransparentNetworkIPResolution`會被忽略。If the `MultiSubnetFailover` key is set to `true`, `TransparentNetworkIPResolution` is ignored. 如果`Failover Partner`設定索引鍵，`TransparentNetworkIPResolution`會被忽略。If the `Failover Partner` key is set, `TransparentNetworkIPResolution` is ignored. 此機碼值必須是`true`， `false`， `yes`，或`no`。The value of this key must be `true`, `false`, `yes`, or `no`. 值為`yes`會視為相同的值為`true`。A value of `yes` is treated the same as a value of `true`. 值為`no`會視為相同的值為`false`。A value of `no` is treated the same as a value of `false`. 此機碼預設為`false`時：This key defaults to `false` when: - 連接到資料來源使用的結束位置的 Azure SQL Database:Connecting to Azure SQL Database where the data source ends with: - .database.chinacloudapi.cn.database.chinacloudapi.cn - .database.usgovcloudapi.net.database.usgovcloudapi.net - .database.cloudapi.de.database.cloudapi.de - .database.windows.net.database.windows.net - `Authentication` Active Directory 密碼 '或' Active Directory 整合式 '`Authentication` is 'Active Directory Password' or 'Active Directory Integrated' 否則，預設為`true`。Otherwise it defaults to `true`.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出通道是否會加密，同時略過驗證信任的憑證鏈結查核。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the channel will be encrypted while bypassing walking the certificate chain to validate trust.
A .

value.span: 可辨識的值為 、、 和 。

span.span: Recognized values are , , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 `TrustServerCertificate` 設定為 `true` 時，傳輸層 (Transport Layer) 會使用 SSL 來加密通道，而略過逐一檢查憑證鏈結以驗證信任的作業。When `TrustServerCertificate` is set to `true`, the transport layer will use SSL to encrypt the channel and bypass walking the certificate chain to validate trust. 如果`TrustServerCertificate`設定為`true`並開啟加密，將使用在伺服器上指定的加密層級即使`Encrypt`設定為`false`。If `TrustServerCertificate` is set to `true` and encryption is turned on, the encryption level specified on the server will be used even if `Encrypt` is set to `false`. 否則連接將會失敗。The connection will fail otherwise. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 加密階層](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/encryption-hierarchy)並[使用加密而不需驗證](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/using-encryption-without-validation)。For more information, see [Encryption Hierarchy](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/encryption-hierarchy) and [Using Encryption Without Validation](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/using-encryption-without-validation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 中值的順序並未指定，但此順序會與 屬性傳回之 中關聯索引鍵的順序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the property. 因為每一個 執行個體一定會包含相同的固定索引鍵集合，所以 屬性會依照與索引鍵相同的順序，傳回對應至此固定索引鍵集合的值。Because each instance of the always contains the same fixed set of keys, the property always returns the values corresponding to the fixed set of keys, in the same order as the keys. ## Examples 下列範例會先建立新的 ，然後逐一查看此物件內的所有值。The following example first creates a new , and then iterates through all the values within the object.
